aug 12. me and thomas talked alll night untill like 2:30. we were talking about stupid stuff. and how it better rain the next day cuz' we needed to share our rainy day kiss. (it didnt rain untill today. and hes gone..:( ) oh man we are so cool. friday the 13th. thomas calls and wakes me up. brother takes me to the airport to pick his friends wife up. bla bla bla. boring. finally go to jennys. hang out. do stupid things. seems like years later. we goto the hotel. yay. but only after we drop tiff katie and jenny off at the texas. jenny tiffer we get to the room holy shit it was NICE! drink. hang out. cody cody and brian aww were so cute how long can u drunkenly stand on one foot? random pix the sam! my love. i FINALLY made good cofee! me and thomas did our little kissie kissie. squishie noses! <33 had a few good talks. bla bla bla. picked jenny and richie up from billys. went to jennys. hung out untill around 3. jenny fell asleep. haha. (convos with thomas before he got picked up because hes going to a co-ed school out of state) me:"so..... this co-ed school.... i hope the chicks are fat" ::laugh:: thomas:"haha why" me:"cuz' your MINE!" thomas:"how am i yours?" me:"uh.... cuz' i say so.." thomas:"how about ill be yours when i come back.." me: ::big smile:: "okay!" ..................................................... thomas:"theres 2 types of girls in my life... ones that i just fuck.... and the ones i like..." me:"uhhhh what one am i?!?" thomas:" well you DONT fuck so then i guess your the other one" me:"oh thats good." im glad he understands i have morals. and he knows sex isnt going to be in our relationship. and he got picked up and we had our last kiss good-bye.. :(. went to sleep in jeffs room. woke up today. hung out with my brother+ ryan+ jenny for a bit. went to the mall. best buy. aww saw chase<33333. still the hott kid i remeber. im glad his life is back together. ne who im going drinking with my brother tonight. and sleeping at jennys. fun times. ps. this rain is for you thomas my love. ill be waiting when u come back<3.

OMG! Last night= THE GREATEST.!.!.!. elaberating: Cody picks me up right after me and my mother got into a HUGE fight. I got in the car in tears. We drive to the four queens. Parking spot 275. Got a room. I think it was 1506. Did many many many trips to the ice machine and to the car to get all the beer. No fridge? HEY! theres a tub! ::Amber's idea btw:: oh man can we have ANY MORE BEER? you would think not. We don't like being statistics. So yeah we decide to walk Fremont street. (picture from our window. wonderful.) but only after a few beers and porn. sam you wish! and calling for more coffe. finally were ready! we made many new friends... tired Brian? and we came back to party with great people... is my butt growing? and we drank some beer.... well okay by this time its 200.. only a few 1/2 beers left... some people left for a while and came back... Cody was starting to kick people out... ::knock knock knock:: ::cody "fuck" opens door slowly:: Cops:"whos room is this?" everyone:"FUCK!" Cody: "mine....." Cops:" your going to jail for distributing to miners... now everyone give me some id..." few moments of people fighting with cops and me trying to get shit together... jhsdsdkjfshdfsdkjhdjgdg!!! I frantically call people to find a sleeping spot for the night... oh man... we sit outside and cody finally comes out... He was put in hand cuffs and into a little room where there where like 10 cops asking him questions. scary. they let him go though! yay... we all go to 711... I get hit on by a 90 year old man.. he was walking by... well slowly with a cane... looks at me, i smile, being nice... he says "dont mind me i am an asshole...::pauses:: how did you get so beautiful?" me " i dont know" ::scared:: We goto codys... chit chat... sleep.. wake up.. dying and thirst.. go to jack in the crack... simply the best:) party on garth! I am 100% up to party tonight!
